attributes.action: to make the laws more strick on people who participate in dog or bird fighting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel more should be done to stamp out these horrific sports, In the modern day I feel it is totally unaceptable that sports like this still go on. I would like to petition for more to be done, for animal organisations to have more power to be able to stop such events happening. How can anyone condone suffering, animal lover or not sothing deserves to be ripped to shreds by its own kid, be taught to fight and then left to die a slow painful death at eh hands of an owner that didn't care in the first place.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
